name: scan2payme
author: Andreas Waldherr (a.waldherr@gmail.com)

sections.description:
This plugin generates QR-Codes containing the banking details of your shop and displays them in the WooCommerce order status page. Your customers can scan this code with their banking app to initiate a SEPA bank transfer without typing.

European Payment Council (EPC) QR-Code

More information on the EPC QR-Code: https://www.europeanpaymentscouncil.eu/document-library/guidance-documents/standardisation-qr-codes-mscts

short_description: Plugin for displaying a European Payment Council QR-Code for SEPA bank transfers. Enables users to initiate a bank transfer by scanning the code with  …
description:
